pullRequest.title: Move getters from DelegateFinder to GameData/GameState
pullRequest.bodyText:
I'm not sure what the original purpose of DelegateFinder is.  It was added back in the first few commits.  But it feels like this abstraction isn't needed anymore.  By adding the functions to GameData and GameState, I'll be able to split up the use of GameData even more.  I'm hoping to be able to change ProData to not use GameData anymore but the few pieces that it does use (GameProperties, GameMap, BattleDelegate, RelationshipTracker, etc).
Testing

Screens Shots

Additional Notes to Reviewer

Release Note

commit.message: Move getters from DelegateFinder to GameData/GameState

nodes.bodyText: These 5 methods were moved from DelegateFinder and modified slightly to not be static methods.  All of the other changes in this PR are edits to use these getters instead of the ones in DelegateFinder.
